data.title: Tom Hanks debuts daring new look on date with wife Rita Wilson
data.meta_description: Catch Me If You Can and Forrest Gump actor Tom Hanks celebrated his wedding anniversary with wife Rita Wilson in London.
data.text:
Tom Hanks sported a very different look as he enjoyed a shopping trip in London with his wife Rita Wilson after their 36th wedding anniversary.

The Forrest Gump actor, 67, is normally suited and booted but wore a beatnik-inspired outfit for his date in the capital.

Looking very punk, he wore a black beret and circular sunglasses reminiscent of John Lennon, a faded denim jacket, and Doc Marten shoes.

Rita, 67, meanwhile, looked very chic in a long black coat and her hair tied back in a bun as Tom carried their shopping bags.

To mark their anniversary, both Tom and Rita posted sweet pictures and captions on their Instagram accounts.

The Elvis actor wrote: ‘1988? April 30th? Big Doings. The Wilson & Hanks couple became Wife & Husband. 36 years! Nothing but Love since… Hanx.’

Rita said: ’36th anniversary! April 30,1988. “Grow old along with me; the best is yet to be.” – Robert Browning.’

The Sleepless in Seattle actor and Rita first met on the set of Bosom Buddies in 1981, although Tom was still married to his college sweetheart the late Samantha Lewes.

They later starred together in 1985 Volunteers and went public with their relationship the following year after Tom had separated from Lewes.

The Toy Story actor and Rita share two sons Chet, 33, and Truman, 28. Tom is also dad to Colin, 46, and Elizabeth, 41, from his relationship to Lewes.

Tom appears to be a regular visitor to London and was even seen lurking in The London Library in September.

The library shared a picture of the Saving Private Ryan actor immersed in a book in the history section.

He was said to be particularly impressed with the ‘rich variety’ of the library’s open-access collections.

It comes after he was forced to issue a warning to fans after an AI promotional video used his image without his consent.

On Instagram, he wrote: ‘BEWARE!! There’s a video out there promoting some dental plan with an AI version of me. I have nothing to do with it.’
